area_name: North Side Boulders (From Outhouse to the Meadow)

content.description: Climb the left side of the slab on the "Span of The Albatross" boulder
content.location: Stay on the path after passing "Diamond Uncut" boulder and "Pass Me The Mustard" boulder. You'll see this up the hill on your right.

content.description: Work your way up the right side of the slab of the "Span of The Albatross" boulder.
content.location: Stay on the path after passing "Diamond Uncut" boulder and "Pass Me The Mustard" boulder. You'll see this up the hill on your right.

content.description: Silly little sit start boulder that moves through the steepish face.
content.protection: Pad and a spotter. The landing is on the downhill side so it's better not to fall.
content.location: A boulder that is about 30 feet to the right of the "Immaculate Incut" boulder.

content.description: Climb a bulletproof piece of slab using pockets and incut crack features.
content.protection: Pad and a spotter. The fall is on the downhill side and you would roll for a long time.
content.location: On the downhill side of the "Diamond Plates" boulder.

content.description: Look for feet deep down under the boulder. Get established on a right hand jug and make a huge move left around the corner to a small crimp. Make another even bigger move to the arete with your right hand and after a high step start working the arete to the top.
content.location: Stay on the path after passing "Diamond Uncut" boulder and "Pass Me The Mustard" boulder. You'll see this up the hill on your right.

content.description: Start matching on a high hand and a high right foot. Make fun moves up the obvious face.
content.location: This will be the first boulder you encounter after going down the trail from the outhouse. It's facing downhill so don't accidentally pass it by.

content.description: Sit start on crimps and make a long move with your right hand. Follow crimps to the top.
content.location: On the right side of the "Diamond Plates" boulder.

content.description: Classic Slab!! Super slick feet and tiny holds. This one is super slabtastic!
content.protection: Pad and a spotter to keep you from rolling down the hill.
content.location: After passing the Diamond Plates boulder, keep on the trail heading in the direction of Enlightenment Ridge (east) paralleling the road. Walk for 5 mins and you'll see this slab on your right.

content.description: HANG START (don't be hopping off the pad) and campus right hand up to crimp above starting hold. Do another campus move left to giant pocket jug and top it out by deadpointing a small pocket over the lip.
content.protection: Pad or Pads and a good spotter. If you fall on any of the moves you'll probably hit the boulder directly under you. Just don't fall.
content.location: Pass "Smoking in the boys room" and keep heading down the hill for another 30 to 50 feet. The boulder is facing downhill so you won't see the climbs until your under them.

content.description: Sit start, move into an undercling and move on up
content.protection: Pad and a spotter. The landing is on the downhill side and there's an old fallen tree right behind you.
content.location: Move down the hill another 30 -50 feet from "Smoking in the boys room" The Immaculate Incut boulder will be 20 feet to the right of "Gamera" and "Mothra" as you're facing UP the hill.

content.description: Climb the right arete of the "Immaculate Uncut" boulder.
content.protection: Pad and a spotter. The landing is on the downhill side and there's an old fallen tree right behind you.
content.location: Move down the hill another 30 -50 feet from "Smoking in the boys room" The Immaculate Incut boulder will be 20 feet to the right of "Gamera" and "Mothra" as you're facing UP the hill.

content.description: HANG START (don't jump start punks), campus left hand up to crimp, move to a series of deep and shallow pockets and top out right.
content.location: Pass "Smoking in the boys room" and keep heading down the hill for another 30 to 50 feet. The boulder is facing downhill so you won't see the climbs until your under them.

content.description: Stand start and move up the incut plates either escaping left at the top out or manteling straight over the bulge.
content.location: Second boulder encountered on the trail from the outhouse. Directly next to Smoking in the boys room.

pathTokens: North Side Boulders (From Outhouse to the Meadow)
